scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs --outDir build/ --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 lib/*.ts && node build/main.js
scripts.generate: FILE=`ls -1t ~/Downloads/2017-*_ur-money-production_data.json.gz | head -1 | xargs -n 1 basename | cut -f 1-2 -d.` && mv ~/Downloads/${FILE}.gz data/ && gunzip data/${FILE}.gz && jq '.users | with_entries(del(.value.chats,.value.chatSummaries, .value.transactions, .value.events, .value.registration.verificationArgs, .value.registration.verificationResult))' data/${FILE} > data/smallUsers.json
scripts.debug: killall -9 node; ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs --outDir build/ --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 lib/*.ts && node --inspect --debug-brk --expose-gc build/main.js
